TextLibrary.Text: I can't believe you thought he'd SELL us the part.
I can't believe you thought he'd SELL us the part.
I can't believe you thought he'd SELL us the part.
I can't believe you thought he'd SELL us the part.

Well, lad, 'tis simple economics. I was thinkin' that a Minotaur wouldna have cause to want such an item as this beautiful beautiful little metal rod, roller and belt. What do you think a Minotaur would be...

Well, lass, 'tis simple economics. I was thinkin' that a Minotaur wouldna have cause to want such an item as this beautiful beautiful little metal rod, roller and belt. What do you think a Minotaur would be...

Well, lass, 'tis simple economics. I was thinkin' that a Minotaur wouldna have cause to want such an item as this beautiful beautiful little metal rod, roller and belt. What do you think a Minotaur would be...
Come on, Khalkus. Let's get back. You must have nearly all of the parts for this machine by now.
